data.question_text: Table 3 shows the specifications of four transmitting systems, S, T, U and V, that can be used for transmitting electromagnetic waves in telecommunication.  Use the information in the table to answer the following questions.

data.question_text: A large fishing boat uses ultrasonic wave to detect the location of a shoal of fish below the boat. Ultrasonic wave of speed 1 500 m s⁻¹ is directed to the fish, calculate

sub_questions.question_text: the wave frequency, if the wavelength is 3.2 cm,
the depth of the fish if the echo is received after 73 ms.

data.question_text: Diagram 11.1 shows a boy playing a horse spring.

sub_questions.question_text: State Hooke's law.

Diagram 11.2(a) shows the original length of a spring before a load is placed on it. Diagram 11.2(b) shows the same spring after the load is removed. Using the correct physics concept, explain the changes of the condition of spring.

data.question_text: By using Diagram 11.3(a) and Diagram 11.3(b), compare the initial length of spring, thickness of spring and compression of spring. Relate the thickness of spring and the compression of spring to make a deduction regarding the relationship between the thickness of spring and the spring constant

Diagram 11.4 shows a sofa that uses springs as a load supporter. Using appropriate physics concepts, suggest the use of materials and appropriate design of sofa that can accommodate a person with a larger mass and more comfortable. Your proposal must include the characteristics of the spring and the additional features.
